archetype_movement_swift.name: Swift
archetype_movement_swift.description: Movement speed increased by half your Tier (rounded up). Traverse the battlefield quicker.

archetype_movement_skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
archetype_movement_skirmisher.description: Does not trigger Punish Attacks for moving. +1 space melee attack reach. Maneuver through enemy lines freely.

archetype_movement_behemoth.name: Behemoth
archetype_movement_behemoth.description: Cannot be Grabbed, Moved, knocked Prone, or Stunned. Consistent positioning regardless of enemy interference.

effects.display: Immune to forced movement and stun

archetype_movement_vanguard.name: Vanguard
archetype_movement_vanguard.description: Enemies that start their turn next to you have their movement speed halved until the start of their next turn. As part of a reaction Punish attack, you may move up to your full movement speed towards the target until the end of their turn. Enhanced zone control and battlefield presence.

archetype_attackType_singleTarget.name: Single Target
archetype_attackType_singleTarget.description: Gain Melee AND Ranged attack types for 0p. Specializes in single-target elimination. The most versatile combat approach.

archetype_attackType_aoeSpecialist.name: AOE Specialist
archetype_attackType_aoeSpecialist.description: Gain AOE attack type for 0p. Excels at crowd control and managing multiple targets. Weaker than single target but hits many.

archetype_attackType_directSpecialist.name: Direct Specialist
archetype_attackType_directSpecialist.description: Gain Direct attack type for 0p. Provides reliable effect delivery that cannot be dodged. Perfect for consistent results.

archetype_effectType_damageSpecialist.name: Damage Specialist
archetype_effectType_damageSpecialist.description: Focus purely on dealing damage for maximum potential. Can still use Basic Conditions as separate attacks.

archetype_effectType_hybridSpecialist.name: Hybrid Specialist
archetype_effectType_hybridSpecialist.description: All attacks MUST combine damage and conditions. A versatile but less powerful approach in each aspect.

archetype_effectType_crowdControl.name: Crowd Control
archetype_effectType_crowdControl.description: Free access to 2 Advanced condition effects (chosen at selection), but suffer -Tier to all Damage rolls. Specializes in enemy control and debilitation, a strong team support role.

archetype_uniqueAbility_versatileMaster.name: Versatile Master
archetype_uniqueAbility_versatileMaster.description: Gain 2 Quick Actions per turn. When you select this archetype or advance Tiers, select a number of Primary Actions equal to half your Tier rounded up. You can use each of those Primary Actions as Quick Actions. At Tier 8, gain a third Quick Action.

effects.display: Gain extra Quick Actions and convert Primary Actions

archetype_uniqueAbility_extraordinary.name: Extraordinary
archetype_uniqueAbility_extraordinary.description: Gain an additional (Tier - 2) × 15 points added to your main pool. You can only spend up to (Tier - 2) × 15 points on Flaws or Traits. Ideal for characters specializing in Unique Abilities.

archetype_uniqueAbility_cutAbove.name: Cut Above
archetype_uniqueAbility_cutAbove.description: Gain universal stat bonuses to all core stats: Accuracy, Damage, Conditions, Avoidance, Durability, Resistances, Initiative, and Movement. Tiers 1-4: +1 | Tiers 5-7: +2 | Tiers 8+: +3.

effects.display: +1/+2/+3 to all stats based on Tier

archetype_defensive_stalwart.name: Stalwart
archetype_defensive_stalwart.description: Subtract your Tier from your Avoidance Score. Choose Physical OR Non-Physical damage: you take half damage from that type. Provides specialized damage resistance.

archetype_defensive_fortress.name: Fortress
archetype_defensive_fortress.description: Add your Tier again to Durability. Provides consistent protection against all damage.

archetype_defensive_resilient.name: Resilient
archetype_defensive_resilient.description: Add your Tier to all three Secondary Resistances (Resolve, Stability, Vitality). Makes you exceptionally good at resisting condition effects.

archetype_defensive_immutable.name: Immutable
archetype_defensive_immutable.description: Choose one Secondary Resistance type to gain complete immunity to it. An unshakeable defense against specific attacks.

archetype_defensive_juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
archetype_defensive_juggernaut.description: Increase your maximum Health Pool by 5 × Tier. Provides extra health reserves for attrition warfare.

archetype_specialAttack_normal.name: Normal
archetype_specialAttack_normal.description: Select 3 Specialty Upgrades at half cost. Limits provide Points × (Tier ÷ 6). Allows maximum customization flexibility.

archetype_specialAttack_specialist.name: Specialist
archetype_specialAttack_specialist.description: All limits selected must be applied to all attacks. Limits provide Points × (Tier ÷ 3). A higher return for a restricted playstyle.

requirements.display: All attacks must use the same 3 limits

archetype_specialAttack_paragon.name: Paragon
archetype_specialAttack_paragon.description: Each special attack receives 10 × Tier points. Cannot take Limits. Provides consistent performance without drawbacks.

archetype_specialAttack_oneTrick.name: One Trick
archetype_specialAttack_oneTrick.description: You can only create a single attack, but it gets Tier × 20 points. Cannot take Limits. High-risk, high-reward specialization.

archetype_specialAttack_straightforward.name: Straightforward
archetype_specialAttack_straightforward.description: Choose a single Limit to apply to all attacks. That Limit returns Points × (Tier ÷ 2). A simple but effective approach.

archetype_specialAttack_sharedUses.name: Shared Uses
archetype_specialAttack_sharedUses.description: You have 10 shared uses among abilities, and each attack costs 1-3 uses. Regenerate 1 Use per turn. Gain a Tier × 5 point discount per use cost. Cannot take Limits.

archetype_specialAttack_dualNatured.name: Dual-Natured
archetype_specialAttack_dualNatured.description: You can create two distinct Special Attacks, and each gets 15 × Tier points. Cannot take Limits. A balanced and versatile option.

archetype_specialAttack_basic.name: Basic
archetype_specialAttack_basic.description: Gain Tier × 10 points for base attack improvements only. No special attacks can be created. Good for builds that rely on their base attack.

archetype_utility_specialized.name: Specialized
archetype_utility_specialized.description: Gain double Tier bonus for one chosen core stat. Cannot purchase additional Expertise.

effects.display: Tier x 2 bonus to a chosen core stat

archetype_utility_practical.name: Practical
archetype_utility_practical.description: Select 3 skills to gain proficiency in, each granting a 2 x Tier bonus to checks.

archetype_utility_jackOfAllTrades.name: Jack of All Trades
archetype_utility_jackOfAllTrades.description: Adds Tier bonus to ALL skill checks. Cannot purchase specialized Expertise.
